title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB: When I follow the steps in 1GEWMOZ, which involve creating a new basic project and a new file called test.xml, and then selecting the test.xml file in the Navigator and choosing 'Open With... / Default Text Editor', nothing happens. The existing scripted resource editor example is not replaced with the default text editor as expected.
EB: When I select 'Open With... / Default Text Editor' for a file that is already open in a different type of editor, the default text editor should replace the current editor and open the file.
SR:
1. Create a new basic project.
2. Create a new file called test.xml.
3. Select the test.xml file in the Navigator.
4. Right-click on the test.xml file and choose 'Open With...'.
5. From the 'Open With' menu, select 'Default Text Editor'.
6. Verify that the scripted resource editor example is replaced with the default text editor and the file is opened in the default text editor.
